name: Neon Ninja VR (ddutchie)
description:
In the wake of beat saber, who does not try to prototype a rhythm VR game. 

This is one of those prototypes.  Slash and shoot your way through waves after waves of enemies to a collection of awesome synth-wave music.

Primary buttons switches your weapons on either hand between your sword and your equipped gun. Holding Secondary button on a controller will equip a shield.
